info.title: DICOM & Voxel Rendering
info.description: Visualize medical data with precision, seamlessly blending DICOM files and voxel-based 3D models.

steps.title: Multi-Layer Visualization
steps.description: Load and visualize DICOM files alongside voxel representations for accurate medical imaging.

steps.title: Mesh Generation from Voxel Data
steps.description: Convert volumetric data into accurate 3D meshes, maintaining precision and detail.

steps.title: Parallel Representation
steps.description: Simultaneously display original voxel data and reconstructed meshes, ensuring complete visualization control.
